subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to give a loan
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$338,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
http://zdqrtx.com/
